newsitem.title: BELGIUM: SOLVAY OUTPERFORMS ON STOCK SPLIT NEWS.
newsitem.headline: SOLVAY OUTPERFORMS ON STOCK SPLIT NEWS.

text.p: Shares in Belgian chemicals group Solvay outperformed other leading blue chips on Tuesday by slipping a mere 0.4 percent while the leading Bel-20 index fell over three percent.
"Solvay is holding up well because of its share split, which the market welcomes," said one trader.
By 1035 GMT the share was down 0.36 percent at 20,725 francs, with a modest 70 million Belgian francs volume traded.
The company announced last Thursday it would propose a 10-for-one stock split at a special shareholders meeting in June. The Brussels bourse was closed on Friday and Monday.
-- Paul de Bendern, Brussels Newsroom +32 2 287 6815, Fax +32 2 230 7710
